entry.title: Sunday night: Light snow. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow beginning early this evening and ending near midnight then 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h this evening. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 in the morning then light in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 22 January 2023
